alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Loving; Lower Brewster County; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Reeves County Plains; Terrell; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor; Ward; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 01 at 2:34PM CST until March 01 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts 60 to 70 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Thursday night. For the Wind Advisory, until 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Andrews; Loving; Lower Brewster County; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Reeves County Plains; Terrell; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor; Ward; Winkler
